get.description: Lists all of the available Azure Data Services on Azure Arc API operations.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 InvalidParameterValue - An invalid value was given to parameter.

 * 400 InvalidCrossSubscriptionVmMove - Invalid cross subscription move of resource.

 * 400 RPGenericUser - User Failure when calling other Resource Provider.

 * 400 InvalidArgument - Invalid argument '{0}'.

 * 400 ArgumentNotInRange - Argument '{0}' not in range.

 * 400 ResourceNotProvisioned - As the resource: {0} is not in a provisioned state, the request cannot be proceeded forward

 * 400 InvalidRgResourceId - Invalid Resourcegroup resource id specified.

 * 403 AccessDenied - Access denied.

 * 404 ResourceNotFound - The requested resource was not found.

 * 404 SubscriptionDoesNotExist - Subscription id does not exist.

 * 404 ResourceDoesNotExist - Resource does not exist.

 * 404 OperationIdNotFound - Operation id could not be found.

 * 404 OperationTypeNotFound - Operation Type not found.

 * 409 ResourceAlreadyExists - Resource already exists.

 * 409 SqlExtensionNotInstalled - SQL extension not installed.

 * 409 MissingMoveResources - Cannot move resources(s) because some resources are missing in the request.

 * 409 OperationInProgress - Operation in progress on resource already.

 * 409 OperationCanceled - Operation Cancelled.

 * 500 RPGenericSystem - System Failure when calling other Resource Provider.

 * 500 UnExpectedErrorOccurred - Unexpected error occurred.

 * 500 OperationTimeout - Operation timed out.

apiVersion.name: api-version

subscriptionId.name: subscriptionId

resourceGroupName.name: resourceGroupName

location.name: location
location.description: The Azure region to use for the request

dataControllerName.name: dataControllerName
dataControllerName.description: The name of the data controller

activeDirectoryConnectorName.name: activeDirectoryConnectorName
activeDirectoryConnectorName.description: The name of the Active Directory connector instance

failoverGroupName.name: failoverGroupName

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to use for this operation.

If-Match.name: ifMatch
If-Match.description: The If-Match header that makes a request conditional.

If-None-Match.name: ifNoneMatch
If-None-Match.description: The If-None-Match header that makes a request conditional.

LocationParameter.name: location
LocationParameter.description: The name of the Azure region.

ManagementGroupNameParameter.name: managementGroupName
ManagementGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the management group. The name is case insensitive.

OperationIdParameter.name: operationId
OperationIdParameter.description: The ID of an ongoing async operation.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

ScopeParameter.name: scope
ScopeParameter.description: The scope at which the operation is performed.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The ID of the target subscription. The value must be an UUID.

TenantIdParameter.name: tenantId
TenantIdParameter.description: The Azure tenant ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000)

SqlManagedInstanceSku.description: The resource model definition representing SKU for Azure Managed Instance - Azure Arc

tier.description: The pricing tier for the instance.

dev.description: Whether dev/test is enabled. When the dev field is set to true, the resource is used for dev/test purpose.

size.description: The SKU size. When the name field is the combination of tier and some other value, this would be the standalone code.

basicLoginInformation.description: Username and password for basic authentication.

lastUploadedDate.description: Last uploaded date from Kubernetes cluster. Defaults to current date time

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the Arc-enabled SQL Managed Instance resource.

activeDirectoryInformation.description: Active Directory information related to this SQL Managed Instance.

licenseType.description: The license type to apply for this managed instance.

clusterId.description: If a CustomLocation is provided, this contains the ARM id of the connected cluster the custom location belongs to.

extensionId.description: If a CustomLocation is provided, this contains the ARM id of the extension the custom location belongs to.

SqlManagedInstanceUpdate.description: An update to a SQL Managed Instance.

replicas.description: This option specifies the number of SQL Managed Instance replicas that will be deployed in your Kubernetes cluster for high availability purposes. If sku.tier is BusinessCritical, allowed values are '2' or '3' with default of '3'. If sku.tier is GeneralPurpose, replicas must be '1'.

K8sSchedulingOptions.description: The kubernetes scheduling options. It describes restrictions used to help Kubernetes select appropriate nodes to host the database service

K8sResourceRequirements.description: The kubernetes resource limits and requests used to restrict or reserve resource usage.

requests.description: Requests for a kubernetes resource type (e.g 'cpu', 'memory'). The 'cpu' request must be less than or equal to 'cpu' limit. Default 'cpu' is 2, minimum is 1. Default 'memory' is '4Gi', minimum is '2Gi. If sku.tier is GeneralPurpose, maximum 'cpu' is 24 and maximum 'memory' is '128Gi'.

limits.description: Limits for a kubernetes resource type (e.g 'cpu', 'memory'). The 'cpu' request must be less than or equal to 'cpu' limit. Default 'cpu' is 2, minimum is 1. Default 'memory' is '4Gi', minimum is '2Gi. If sku.tier is GeneralPurpose, maximum 'cpu' is 24 and maximum 'memory' is '128Gi'.

keytabSecret.description: Keytab secret used to authenticate with Active Directory.

mode.description: Transparent data encryption mode. Can be Service Managed, Customer managed or disabled

protectorSecret.description: Protector secret for customer managed Transparent data encryption mode

forceencryption.description: If 1, then SQL Server forces all connections to be encrypted. By default, this option is 0

tlsciphers.description: Specifies which ciphers are allowed by SQL Server for TLS

tlsprotocols.description: A comma-separated list of which TLS protocols are allowed by SQL Server

KeytabInformation.description: Keytab used for authenticate with Active Directory.

ActiveDirectoryInformation.description: Active Directory information that related to the resource.

keytabInformation.description: Keytab information that is used for the Sql Managed Instance when Active Directory authentication is used.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

AvailabilityGroupConfigure.description: The specifications of the availability group replica configuration

endpointUrl.description: Mirroring endpoint URL of availability group replica

availabilityModeDescription.description: The Availability Synchronization mode of the availability group replica.

failoverModeDescription.description: The failover mode of the availability group replica.

sessionTimeout.description: The time-out period of availability group session replica, in seconds.

primaryRoleAllowConnectionsDescription.description: Whether the availability allows all connections or only read-write connections.

secondaryRoleAllowConnectionsDescription.description: Whether an availability replica that is performing the secondary role (that is, a secondary replica) can accept connections from clients.

replicaCreateDate.description: Date that the replica was created.

replicaModifyDate.description: Date that the replica was modified.

backupPriority.description: Represents the user-specified priority for performing backups on this replica relative to the other replicas in the same availability group.

readOnlyRoutingUrl.description: Connectivity endpoint (URL) of the read only availability replica.

readWriteRoutingUrl.description: Connectivity endpoint (URL) of the read write availability replica.

AvailabilityGroupState.description: The specifications of the availability group state

availabilityGroupReplicaRole.description: Current Always On availability groups role of the availability group replica.

operationalStateDescription.description: Current operational state of the availability group replica

recoveryHealthDescription.description: Recovery health of the availability group replica.

synchronizationHealthDescription.description: Reflects a rollup of the database synchronization state (synchronization_state) of all joined availability databases (also known as replicas) and the availability mode of the replica (synchronous-commit or asynchronous-commit mode). The rollup will reflect the least healthy accumulated state the databases on the replica.

connectedStateDescription.description: Whether a secondary replica is currently connected to the primary replica.

lastConnectErrorDescription.description: Text description of the last connection error of the availability group replica.

lastConnectErrorTimestamp.description: Date and time timestamp indicating when the last connect error occurred.

AvailabilityGroupInfo.description: The specifications of the availability group state

failureConditionLevel.description: User-defined failure condition level under which an automatic failover must be triggered.

healthCheckTimeout.description: Wait time (in milliseconds) for the sp_server_diagnostics system stored procedure to return server-health information, before the server instance is assumed to be slow or not responding.

automatedBackupPreferenceDescription.description: Preferred location for performing backups on the availability databases in this availability group.

version.description: SQL Server availability group current version.

basicFeatures.description: Specifies whether this is a basic availability group.

dtcSupport.description: Specifies whether DTC support has been enabled for this availability group.

dbFailover.description: Specifies whether the availability group supports failover for database health conditions.

isDistributed.description: Specifies whether this is a distributed availability group.

clusterTypeDescription.description: SQL Server availability group cluster type description

requiredSynchronizedSecondariesToCommit.description: The number of secondary replicas that must be in a synchronized state for a commit to complete.

isContained.description: SQL Server availability group contained system databases.

primaryReplica.description: Name of the server instance that is hosting the current primary replica.

primaryRecoveryHealthDescription.description: Indicates the recovery health of the primary replica.

secondaryRecoveryHealthDescription.description: Indicates the recovery health of a secondary replica.

synchronizationHealthDescription.description: Reflects a roll-up of the synchronization health of all availability replicas in the availability group.

ArcSqlServerAvailabilityGroupListResult.description: A list of Arc Sql Server Availability Groups.

value.description: Array of Arc Sql Server Availability Groups.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

properties.description: Properties of Arc Sql Server availability group

SqlServerAvailabilityGroupResourceProper.description: The properties of Arc Sql Server availability group resource

availabilityGroupId.description: ID GUID of the availability group.

collectionTimestamp.description: Timestamp for when the data was collected from the client machine.

replicas.description: A list of Availability Group Replicas.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

databases.description: A list of Availability Group Database Replicas.

value.description: Array of Availability Group Database Replicas.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the Arc-enabled SQL Server availability group resource.

SqlServerAvailabilityGroupUpdate.description: An update to availability group resource.

SqlAvailabilityGroupReplicaResourcePrope.description: The properties of Arc Sql availability group replica resource

replicaId.description: ID GUID of the availability group.

SqlAvailabilityGroupDatabaseReplicaResou.description: The properties of Arc Sql availability group database replica resource

isLocal.description: Whether the availability database is local.

isPrimaryReplica.description: Returns 1 if the replica is primary, or 0 if it is a secondary replica.

isCommitParticipant.description: Whether this replica is transaction committer.

synchronizationHealthDescription.description: Description of the health of database.

databaseStateDescription.description: Description of the database state of the availability replica.

isSuspended.description: Whether this data movement is suspended.

suspendReasonDescription.description: Description of the database suspended state reason.

CommonSku.description: The resource model definition representing SKU for ARM resources

name.description: The name of the SKU.  It is typically a letter+number code

dev.description: Whether dev/test is enabled. When the dev field is set to true, the resource is used for dev/test purpose.

size.description: The SKU size. When the name field is the combination of tier and some other value, this would be the standalone code.

family.description: If the service has different generations of hardware, for the same SKU, then that can be captured here.

capacity.description: If the SKU supports scale out/in then the capacity integer should be included. If scale out/in is not possible for the resource this may be omitted.

ExtendedLocation.description: The complex type of the extended location.

name.description: The name of the extended location.

type.description: The type of the extended location.

BasicLoginInformation.description: Username and password for basic login authentication.

Operation.title: REST API Operation
Operation.description: Details of a REST API operation, returned from the Resource Provider Operations API

name.description: The name of the operation, as per Resource-Based Access Control (RBAC). Examples: "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/write", "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/capture/action"

isDataAction.description: Whether the operation applies to data-plane. This is "true" for data-plane operations and "false" for ARM/control-plane operations.

display.description: Localized display information for this particular operation.

provider.description: The localized friendly form of the resource provider name, e.g. "Microsoft Monitoring Insights" or "Microsoft Compute".

resource.description: The localized friendly name of the resource type related to this operation. E.g. "Virtual Machines" or "Job Schedule Collections".

operation.description: The concise, localized friendly name for the operation; suitable for dropdowns. E.g. "Create or Update Virtual Machine", "Restart Virtual Machine".

description.description: The short, localized friendly description of the operation; suitable for tool tips and detailed views.

origin.description: The intended executor of the operation; as in Resource Based Access Control (RBAC) and audit logs UX. Default value is "user,system"

actionType.description: Enum. Indicates the action type. "Internal" refers to actions that are for internal only APIs.

OperationListResult.description: A list of REST API operations supported by an Azure Resource Provider. It contains an URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of operations supported by the resource provider

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results (if there are any).

OperationDisplay.description: Display metadata associated with the operation.

provider.description: The localized friendly form of the resource provider name.

resource.description: The localized friendly form of the resource type related to this action/operation.

operation.description: The localized friendly name for the operation.

description.description: The localized friendly description for the operation.

ArcSqlServerDatabaseListResult.description: A list of Arc Sql Server database.

value.description: Array of  Arc Sql Server database.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

properties.description: Properties of Arc Sql Server database

SqlServerDatabaseResourceProperties.description: The properties of Arc Sql Server database resource

isReadOnly.description: Whether the database is read only or not.

databaseOptions.description: List of features that are enabled for the database

lastFullBackup.description: Date time of last full backup.

lastLogBackup.description: Date time of last log backup.

backupPolicy.description: The backup profile for the SQL server.

earliestRestoreDate.description: This records the earliest start date and time that restore is available for this database (ISO8601 format).

createMode.description: Database create mode. PointInTimeRestore: Create a database by restoring a point in time backup of an existing database. sourceDatabaseId and restorePointInTime must be specified.

sourceDatabaseId.description: The resource identifier of the source database associated with create operation of this database.

restorePointInTime.description: Conditional. If createMode is PointInTimeRestore, this value is required. Specifies the point in time (ISO8601 format) of the source database that will be restored to create the new database.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the Arc-enabled SQL Server database resource.

lastDatabaseUploadTime.description: The time when last successful database upload was performed.

BackupPolicy.description: The backup profile for the SQL server.

retentionPeriodDays.description: The retention period for all the databases in this managed instance.

fullBackupDays.description: The value indicating days between full backups.

differentialBackupHours.description: The differential backup interval in hours.

transactionLogBackupMinutes.description: The value indicating minutes between transaction log backups.

containerResourceId.description: ARM Resource id of the container resource (Azure Arc for Servers).

createTime.description: The time when the resource was created.

vCore.description: The number of logical processors used by the SQL Server instance.

cores.description: The number of total cores of the Operating System Environment (OSE) hosting the SQL Server instance.

tcpDynamicPorts.description: Dynamic TCP ports used by SQL Server.

tcpStaticPorts.description: Static TCP ports used by SQL Server.

azureDefenderStatusLastUpdated.description: Timestamp of last Azure Defender status update.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the Arc-enabled SQL Server resource.

lastInventoryUploadTime.description: The time when last successful inventory upload was performed.

lastUsageUploadTime.description: The time when last successful usage upload was performed.

hostType.description: Type of host for Azure Arc SQL Server

alwaysOnRole.description: The role of the SQL Server, based on availability.

backupPolicy.description: The backup profile for the SQL server.

upgradeLockedUntil.description: Upgrade Action for this resource is locked until it expires. The Expiration time indicated by this value. It is not locked when it is empty.

containerResourceId.description: ARM Resource id of the container resource (Azure Arc for Servers).

createTime.description: The time when the resource was created.

vCore.description: The number of logical processors used by the SQL Server instance.

cores.description: The number of total cores of the Operating System Environment (OSE) hosting the SQL Server instance.

tcpDynamicPorts.description: Dynamic TCP ports used by SQL Server.

tcpStaticPorts.description: Static TCP ports used by SQL Server.

azureDefenderStatusLastUpdated.description: Timestamp of last Azure Defender status update.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the Arc-enabled SQL Server resource.

lastInventoryUploadTime.description: The time when last successful inventory upload was performed.

lastUsageUploadTime.description: The time when last successful usage upload was performed.

hostType.description: Type of host for Azure Arc SQL Server

alwaysOnRole.description: The role of the SQL Server, based on availability.

backupPolicy.description: The backup profile for the SQL server.

upgradeLockedUntil.description: Upgrade Action for this resource is locked until it expires. The Expiration time indicated by this value. It is not locked when it is empty.

id.description: The GUID of the SQL Server's underlying Failover Cluster.

networkName.description: The network name to connect to the SQL FCI.

sqlInstanceIds.description: The ARM IDs of the Arc SQL Server resources, belonging to the current server's Failover cluster.

hostNames.description: The host names which are part of the SQL FCI resource group.

SqlServerInstanceUpdate.description: An update to a SQL Server Instance.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

enabled.description: Indicates if monitoring is enabled for this SQL Server instance.

SqlServerInstanceTelemetryRequest.description: The Arc SQL Server instance telemetry retrieval request.

datasetName.description: The name of the telemetry dataset to retrieve.

startTime.description: The start time for the time range to fetch telemetry for. If not specified, the current time minus 1 hour is used.

endTime.description: The end time for the time range to fetch telemetry for. If not specified, the current time is used.

interval.description: The time granularity to fetch telemetry for. This is an ISO8601 duration. Examples: PT15M, PT1H, P1D

aggregationType.description: The aggregation type to use for the numerical columns in the dataset.

databaseNames.description: The list of database names to return telemetry for. If not specified, telemetry for all databases will be aggregated and returned.

SqlServerInstanceTelemetryColumn.description: The telemetry column for the SQL Server instance.

name.description: The name of the telemetry column.

type.description: The type of the telemetry column.

SqlServerInstanceTelemetryRow.description: An array of values representing a telemetry row for the SQL Server instance.

SqlServerInstanceTelemetryResponse.description: A section of the telemetry response for the SQL Server instance.

columns.description: The columns of the result telemetry table for the SQL Server instance.

rows.description: A list of rows from the result telemetry table for the SQL Server instance.

nextLink.description: The link to the next section of rows of the telemetry response for the SQL Server instance. Null if no more sections are available.

PostgresInstanceSku.description: The resource model definition representing SKU for Azure Database for PostgresSQL - Azure Arc

tier.description: This field is required to be implemented by the Resource Provider if the service has more than one tier.

basicLoginInformation.description: Username and password for basic authentication.

lastUploadedDate.description: Last uploaded date from Kubernetes cluster. Defaults to current date time

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the Azure Arc-enabled PostgreSQL instance.

PostgresInstanceUpdate.description: An update to a Postgres Instance.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

domainServiceAccountLoginInformation.description: Username and password for domain service account authentication.

ActiveDirectoryConnectorSpec.description: The specifications of the AD Kubernetes resource.

realm.description: Name (uppercase) of the Active Directory domain that this AD connector will be associated with.

netbiosDomainName.description: NETBIOS name of the Active Directory domain.

serviceAccountProvisioning.description: The service account provisioning mode for this Active Directory connector.

ouDistinguishedName.description: The distinguished name of the Active Directory Organizational Unit.

domainName.description: DNS domain name for which DNS lookups should be forwarded to the Active Directory DNS servers.

nameserverIPAddresses.description: List of Active Directory DNS server IP addresses.

replicas.description: Replica count for DNS proxy service. Default value is 1.

preferK8sDnsForPtrLookups.description: Flag indicating whether to prefer Kubernetes DNS server response over AD DNS server response for IP address lookups.

ActiveDirectoryDomainControllers.description: Details about the Active Directory domain controllers associated with this AD connector instance

primaryDomainController.description: Information about the Primary Domain Controller (PDC) in the AD domain.

ActiveDirectoryDomainController.description: Information about a domain controller in the AD domain.

hostname.description: Fully-qualified domain name of a domain controller in the AD domain.

ActiveDirectorySecondaryDomainController.description: Information about the secondary domain controllers in the AD domain.

items.description: List of the fully-qualified domain names of the secondary domain controllers in the AD domain.

ActiveDirectoryConnectorStatus.description: The status of the Kubernetes custom resource.

lastUpdateTime.description: The time that the custom resource was last updated.

observedGeneration.description: The version of the replicaSet associated with the AD connector custom resource.

state.description: The state of the AD connector custom resource.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

DataControllerUpdate.description: Used for updating a data controller resource.

infrastructure.description: The infrastructure the data controller is running on.

lastUploadedDate.description: Last uploaded date from Kubernetes cluster. Defaults to current date time

basicLoginInformation.description: Deprecated. Azure Arc Data Services data controller no longer expose any endpoint. All traffic are exposed through Kubernetes native API.

metricsDashboardCredential.description: Login credential for metrics dashboard on the Kubernetes cluster.

logsDashboardCredential.description: Login credential for logs dashboard on the Kubernetes cluster.

uploadServicePrincipal.description: Deprecated. Service principal is deprecated in favor of Arc Kubernetes service extension managed identity.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the Arc Data Controller resource.

clusterId.description: If a CustomLocation is provided, this contains the ARM id of the connected cluster the custom location belongs to.

extensionId.description: If a CustomLocation is provided, this contains the ARM id of the extension the custom location belongs to.

UploadWatermark.description: Properties on upload watermark.  Mostly timestamp for each upload data type

metrics.description: Last uploaded date for metrics from kubernetes cluster. Defaults to current date time

logs.description: Last uploaded date for logs from kubernetes cluster. Defaults to current date time

usages.description: Last uploaded date for usages from kubernetes cluster. Defaults to current date time

OnPremiseProperty.description: Properties from the Kubernetes data controller

id.description: A globally unique ID identifying the associated Kubernetes cluster

publicSigningKey.description: Certificate that contains the Kubernetes cluster public key used to verify signing

signingCertificateThumbprint.description: Unique thumbprint returned to customer to verify the certificate being uploaded

LogAnalyticsWorkspaceConfig.description: Log analytics workspace id and primary key

UploadServicePrincipal.description: Service principal for uploading billing, metrics and logs.

clientId.description: Client ID of the service principal for uploading data.

tenantId.description: Tenant ID of the service principal.

authority.description: Authority for the service principal. Example: https://login.microsoftonline.com/

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

spec.description: The specifications of the failover group resource.

status.description: The status of the failover group custom resource.

sharedName.description: The shared name of the failover group for this SQL managed instance. Both SQL managed instance and its partner have to use the same shared name.

sourceMI.description: The name of the SQL managed instance with this failover group role.

partnerMI.description: The name of the partner SQL managed instance.

partnerMirroringURL.description: The mirroring endpoint URL of the partner SQL managed instance.

partnerMirroringCert.description: The mirroring endpoint public certificate for the partner SQL managed instance. Only PEM format is supported.

partnerSyncMode.description: The partner sync mode of the SQL managed instance.

role.description: The role of the SQL managed instance in this failover group.

AzureEntityResource.title: Entity Resource
AzureEntityResource.description: The resource model definition for an Azure Resource Manager resource with an etag.

name.description: The name of the resource for which availability needs to be checked.

nameAvailable.description: Indicates if the resource name is available.

reason.description: The reason why the given name is not available.

message.description: Detailed reason why the given name is available.

ErrorAdditionalInfo.description: The resource management error additional info.

ErrorResponse.title: Error response
ErrorResponse.description: Common error response for all Azure Resource Manager APIs to return error details for failed operations. (This also follows the OData error response format.).

principalId.description: The principal ID of resource identity. The value must be an UUID.

tenantId.description: The tenant ID of resource. The value must be an UUID.

keyIdentifier.description: Key vault uri to access the encryption key.

identity.description: The client ID of the identity which will be used to access key vault.

OperationStatusResult.description: The current status of an async operation.

id.description: Fully qualified ID for the async operation.

resourceId.description: Fully qualified ID of the resource against which the original async operation was started.

percentComplete.description: Percent of the operation that is complete.

startTime.description: The start time of the operation.

endTime.description: The end time of the operation.

error.description: If present, details of the operation error.

name.description: A user defined name of the 3rd Party Artifact that is being procured.

publisher.description: The publisher of the 3rd Party Artifact that is being bought. E.g. NewRelic

product.description: The 3rd Party artifact that is being procured. E.g. NewRelic. Product maps to the OfferID specified for the artifact at the time of Data Market onboarding.

promotionCode.description: A publisher provided promotion code as provisioned in Data Market for the said product/artifact.

version.description: The version of the desired product/artifact.

ProxyResource.title: Proxy Resource
ProxyResource.description: The resource model definition for a Azure Resource Manager proxy resource. It will not have tags and a location

Resource.title: Resource
Resource.description: Common fields that are returned in the response for all Azure Resource Manager resources

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. E.g. "/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}"

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

ResourceModelWithAllowedPropertySet.description: The resource model definition containing the full set of allowed properties for a resource. Except properties bag, there cannot be a top level property outside of this set.

managedBy.description: The fully qualified resource ID of the resource that manages this resource. Indicates if this resource is managed by another Azure resource. If this is present, complete mode deployment will not delete the resource if it is removed from the template since it is managed by another resource.

kind.description: Metadata used by portal/tooling/etc to render different UX experiences for resources of the same type. E.g. ApiApps are a kind of Microsoft.Web/sites type.  If supported, the resource provider must validate and persist this value.

etag.description: The etag field is *not* required. If it is provided in the response body, it must also be provided as a header per the normal etag convention.  Entity tags are used for comparing two or more entities from the same requested resource. HTTP/1.1 uses entity tags in the etag (section 14.19), If-Match (section 14.24), If-None-Match (section 14.26), and If-Range (section 14.27) header fields.

Sku.description: The resource model definition representing SKU

name.description: The name of the SKU. E.g. P3. It is typically a letter+number code

size.description: The SKU size. When the name field is the combination of tier and some other value, this would be the standalone code.

family.description: If the service has different generations of hardware, for the same SKU, then that can be captured here.

capacity.description: If the SKU supports scale out/in then the capacity integer should be included. If scale out/in is not possible for the resource this may be omitted.

SkuTier.description: This field is required to be implemented by the Resource Provider if the service has more than one tier, but is not required on a PUT.

TrackedResource.title: Tracked Resource
TrackedResource.description: The resource model definition for an Azure Resource Manager tracked top level resource which has 'tags' and a 'location'

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

encryptionProperties.description: Configuration of key for data encryption

status.description: Indicates whether or not the encryption is enabled for container registry.

locationData.description: Metadata pertaining to the geographic location of the resource.

name.description: A canonical name for the geographic or physical location.

city.description: The city or locality where the resource is located.

district.description: The district, state, or province where the resource is located.

countryOrRegion.description: The country or region where the resource is located

systemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)
